pages.text: $(item)Obelisks$() are ancient structures that generate specific types of magical energy. There are 4 types, each producing a different energy:$(br2)$(li)$(lunar)Lunar Obelisk$() - Lunar energy$(li)$(stellar)Stellar Obelisk$() - Stellar energy$(li)$(#ffdd44)Solar Obelisk$() - Solar energy$(li)$(void)Void Obelisk$() - Void energy$(br2)These energies are required for different $(l)Ritual$() recipes at the Altar Core.

pages.title: Linking to Altar
pages.text: Obelisks must be linked directly to an $(item)Altar Core$() using a $(item)Linking Wand$().$(br2)$(l)How to link:$()$(br)$(li)Right-click the Obelisk with Linking Wand$(li)Right-click the Altar Core$(li)A connection is established$(br2)Once linked, the Obelisk will supply its energy to the Altar, enabling rituals that require that energy type.
$(lunar)Lunar Obelisk$() - Uses Moonstone and Lunar Pillar.
$(stellar)Stellar Obelisk$() - Uses Star Fragments and Polished Moonstone.
$(#ffdd44)Solar Obelisk$() - Uses Gold Ingots and Smooth Stone.
$(void)Void Obelisk$() - Uses Ender Pearls and Obsidian.
